info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Broome and southwestern Chenango Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Greene to near Vestal Center. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Johnson City, Kirkwood, Conklin, Port Dickinson, Windsor, Afton, Chenango Forks, Chenango Bridge and Harpursville. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 6. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 70 North and 79. Interstate 88 between 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and will briefly reduce visibilities.
